item.title: Installation
item.description: Visit the github releaes page for binaries Linux For debian based systems supper is available as a debian package. The package will install supper and set up a systemd unit for ease of use. Download the debian package from the github releaes page and install with dpkg -i supper-1.0.0.deb Windows Download the .tar.gz file from the github releaes page and extract the contents to a desired location. This could for example be:
